amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account by $30 million and increase the Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Air Force account by similar amount in order to support research and development of cyberdefense, advanced communication and information technology programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account by $30 million and increase the Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Air Force account by $30 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hanna amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hanna amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Hanna.
